members.signatureBeforeChange: public File createTempFile(String prefix, String suffix, File parentDir,                                boolean deleteOnExit)
members.signatureAfterChange: public File createTempFile(String prefix, String suffix,             File parentDir, boolean deleteOnExit)
diff: -            throw new BuildException("Could not create tempfile in " + parent, e);
+    public File createTempFile(String prefix, String suffix,
+        return createTempFile(prefix, suffix, parentDir, deleteOnExit, false);

members.signatureBeforeChange: public static URL[] getLocationURLs(File location,                                         final String[] extensions)          throws MalformedURLException
members.signatureAfterChange: public static URL[] getLocationURLs(File location,                                         final String[] extensions)          throws MalformedURLException
diff: -                         * File.toURL() does not encode characters like #.
-                         * File.toURI() has been introduced in java 1.4, so
-                         * ANT cannot use it (except by reflection)
-                         * FileUtils.toURI() cannot be used by Locator.java
-                         * File.toURL() adds file: and changes '\' to '/' for dos OSes
-                         * encodeURI converts characters like ' ' and '#' to %DD
